description: This file defines a React component named Sidebar that renders game stats, next pieces, and hold piece for a Tetris game. It also includes a sub-component MiniPiece used for rendering small previews of Tetris pieces.

methods.name: MiniPiece({ pieceKey })
methods.description: React component that renders a 4x4 grid preview of a Tetris piece, centered within the grid.

methods.name: Sidebar({ score, level, lines, nextPieces, holdPieceKey })
methods.description: Main React component that displays game statistics, next pieces, and hold piece in a Tetris game.

ctags.name: Sidebar
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Sidebar({ score, level, lines, nextPieces, holdPieceKey }) {$/
